🚨 AIRDROP RUMOUR 🚨 Could be a good play to stake some $MATIC in @omnidotapp. Reasons 👇 1. You get a chance to win from a prize pool of $10,000 2. You earn $MATIC staking yield 3. Chance of an $OMNI token down the line 🪂
Omni: Omni is excited to launch our inaugural Staking Sweepstakes! Stake as you would, enter for a chance to win prize money 💸💸💸 Our first Sweepstakes will kick off with $MATIC staking and a total prize pool worth 10,000 USD 💰 You have until January 8th to enter. Here's how ⬇️

entry.summary:
🚨 AIRDROP CONFIRMED 🚨 @SturdyFinance has announced its $STRY airdrop to select users: - Yearn stablecoin vault users - specific Convex LP's - Sturdy lenders & borrowers - Top 500 @DegenScore - LP's in select Aura pools Check your eligibility here:
DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊: 🚨 AIRDROP RUMOUR 🚨 @SturdyFinance is a lending platform with a focus on interest-bearing collateral. E.g you can deposit Curve sUSD LP tokens earning 10% APY and then borrow $USDC or $DAI against that same collateral at 0% borrow cost. Why 0%? 👇
